overview:
Marketing, technology and business manager with fifteen years experience delivering innovative information technology solutions to consumers and enterprises in North America, South America, Europe, and Asia.

Significant early to late-stage entrepeneurial experience. Skilled in managing the entire product lifecycle, evaluating product development investment decisions, researching and documenting marketing and product requirements, and launching new products. In-depth facility with a wide breadth of software technologies. Character reflecting integrity, leadership, and solution orientation. Berkeley and Wharton Alumnus.
